title: Democrats Get More Bad News on Inflation
description:
The last consumer-price report before the November midterm election shows inflation is still running hot at 8.2%. What does it mean for the economy, for the Federal Reserve, and when voters go to the polls in four weeks? 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Paul Gigot, The Wall Street Journal
